name: Ontology Manager
observations: Added E2E coverage for ontology-backed roles via ABAC/ReBAC endpoints.
Backend now falls back to latest ontology version containing Role class if no system version is flagged.
AI endpoints are protected under /api/ai and are used by ontology designer, context generator, role designer, class description, and admin AI settings.
docker-compose now sets AI_SERVICE_URL=http://llm:11434/v1 with AI_PREFER_ENV=true for backend.

name: Ontology roles E2E tests
observations: Added Playwright test to verify default roles and admin permissions via /api/abac and /api/rebac.
Updated e2e docs to reference ontology role test.
Ran Playwright E2E suite successfully after backend update.
New test file: frontend/tests/ontology-roles.spec.ts.
Backend updated: backend/src/features/ontology/service.rs get_system_version fallback to version with Role class.

name: Ollama usage verification
observations: Reviewed AI/LLM usage in backend and frontend and added config normalization for api_base /v1.
Added AI_PREFER_ENV override for containerized Ollama usage and updated docker-compose to point backend at llm service.
Added migration to normalize AiProvider api_base and replace host.docker.internal with localhost.
Updated AI admin UI default api_base to localhost and ports doc to include Ollama 11434.
Fixed AI health/model listing to call /api/tags on Ollama; backend now reports status Healthy.
Confirmed Ollama reachable at http://localhost:11434 and backend /api/ai/status returns Healthy with model llama3.

name: Backend auth test coverage review
observations: Reviewed backend auth tests in backend/tests/auth_test.rs, auth_api_test.rs, and jwt_test.rs.

Coverage gaps noted: auth middleware negative paths, refresh token rotation/logout revocation, admin session revoke_any, notifications stream/read-all, validation edge cases, and ignored JWT expiry test.

name: Backend JWT test coverage improvements
observations: Added JWT tests for expired token rejection without flakiness (negative expiry).
Added tests for file-based PEM fallback, missing key files error, invalid private PEM, and invalid public PEM.
Introduced guarded helpers in backend/tests/jwt_test.rs to manage cwd/key files safely.
Ran `cargo test --test jwt_test` in backend; all 29 JWT tests passed (warnings unrelated).

name: Backlog JWT recommendations update
observations: Added JWT test coverage recommendations section to docs/BACKLOG.md with completed items and a future issuer/audience test recommendation.

name: Backlog feature-based reorg
observations: Rewrote docs/BACKLOG.md into feature-based sections with a Quick View for remaining work.
Added auth testing backlog items (middleware negatives, refresh/logout revocation, admin revoke-any, notifications stream/read-all, validation edges).
Grouped Auth, Authorization, Ontology, Admin, Notifications, UX, Testing, and Infra tasks with Done/Partial/Todo lists.
